snippet.title: What is the best free program to convert wav files to mp3?
snippet.description: Download Audacity. Download the LAME mp3 encoder, open ur audio file in audacity and click File->save as MP3 or Convert to mp3 or something, itll say something like it needs an encoder, specifiy the directory where ur lame mp3 encoder is and there u go, audacity can convert to MP3.
